content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was asked by the user to find the correct path to the ch01.ipynb file. I used the command "browse_website" to search for the information, but the website did not provide any relevant information. The user then sent a command to search for the path using Google search.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://github.com/fastai/fastbook/blob/master/01_intro.ipynb", "https://medium.com/macoclock/fastai-course-chapter-1-on-mac-faf0c9ee738b", "https://github.com/fastai/fastbook/blob/master/11_midlevel_data.ipynb", "https://colab.research.google.com/github/fastai/fastbook/blob/master/01_intro.ipynb", "https://forums.fast.ai/t/lesson-1-how-do-i-get-started-using-my-own-images-for-classification/75497", "https://colab.research.google.com/github/huggingface/blog/blob/main/notebooks/64_fastai_hub.ipynb", "https://forums.fast.ai/t/practice-walk-thru-6-chp1-on-kaggle/96793", "https://colab.research.google.com/github/fastai/fastbook/blob/master/10_nlp.ipynb"]'}]
"""
